author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free. The first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription and a 30-day free trial.

Sometimes, humans invent a technology that changes the game. From ancient hand axes to gunpowder, here are 6 weapons that changed the course of human history.

Hosted by: Reid Reimers (he/him)

title: 6 Weapons That Changed Human History Forever
